name: Space Cleaner (Team Cristaline)
description:
"Hello SC-631762-0001, You have been conceived for one mission :

Clean the road and let vehicles travel across the town

Oh, one thing ! The drivers will not spare you. Even if you're not a big loss, we don't want to spend all our time creating different versions of you. So be careful."

The Game

The SC-631762 series are robots create for clean the spatial road of the different garbages dropped by the drivers. Their job is also to clean these garbages to prevent accidents. Whatever they want, they will not escape from their responsabilities, whatever they want they will clean for the drivers, die for the drivers and come back for the drivers

Key Features 

  • Zero Gravity - Move into the space and experiment the truly experience of the zero gravity
  •  Clean - Your job is to clean the garbages dropped around the city and put them into the garbage truck
  • Drivers - The cars are not only there to make the level pretty, They are also here to kill you without meaning to do so obviously
  • Dash - Use your boost to dodge the vehicles and go to your garbage truck  faster.

Space Cleaner is a School Project made by the Team Cristaline, a group of six students from E-Artsup Montpellier :

Antoine : Junior Programer

Maximilien : Junior Programer

Anaïs : Junior Graphic Designer (2D/3D)

Eric : Junior Graphic Designer (2D/3D)

Morgan : Junior Graphic Designer (2D/3D)

Fiona : Junior Graphic Designer (2D/3D)
